info.title: User Service
info.description: With our AI-driven financial recommendations track your spending, create a budget, save for the future, all while connecting with others who are on the same financial journey as you !

get.description:
This endpoint returns the user record id if the user record exists
example: /api/v1/user?email=testuser@gmail.com&&username=testuser

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the user of interest

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user of interest

post.description: This endpoint performs an a creation operation of a user account based on the provided parametersThis operation is implemented as a distributed transactions as this operation spans multiple services

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

put.description: This endpoint performs an updates operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis update operation can span multiple services on specific cases (such as when the client is explicitly attempting to update the email of the user)All update operations are atomic by nature hence we should not expect any form of divergent state

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

get.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the provided parameters

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
The account ID associated with the user
Validations:
- user_id must be greater than 0

delete.description: This endpoint performs a delete operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis deletion operation spans multiple services as user details are stored across a suite of our backend servicesThe operation itself is an atomic one of nature. Either all services successfully delete the recod or we fail the requestDivergent state is not expected to be encountered with this endpoint.

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
The account ID associated with the user to delete
Validations:
- user_id must be greater than 0

get.summary: Retrieve user account details by authn id
get.description: Fetches detailed information about a user account based on the specified authn ID.

200.description: Successful retrieval of user account details.

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

parameters.name: authnId
parameters.description:
Specifies the user's authn account ID.

Validations:
- Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: profileType
parameters.description:
Indicates the profile type to be queried.
For example: "username:testuser"

get.description: Fetches detailed information about a user account based on the specified user ID.

200.description: Successful retrieval of user account details.

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
Specifies the user's account ID.

Validations:
- Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: profileType
parameters.description:
Indicates the profile type to be queried.
For example: "username:testuser"

delete.description: This endpoint performs a delete operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis deletion operation spans multiple services as user details are stored across a suite of our backend servicesThe operation itself is an atomic one of nature. Either all services successfully delete the recod or we fail the requestDivergent state is not expected to be encountered with this endpoint.

400.description: Request failed due to invalid input.

404.description: Request failed due to incorrect path.

500.description: Request failed due to internal server error.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
The account ID associated with the user to delete
Validations:
- user_id must be greater than 0

parameters.name: profileType
parameters.description: the profile type of the given user we hope to query

areasOfInterest.title: List of areas of interest for insights

dataSharing.title: True if user agrees to share data for insights

address.title:
the address field
Validations:
- must be at least 5 character long (meaning cannot be empty)

unit.title:
the unit if the address is an apartment
Validations:
- must be at least 1 character long (meaning cannot be empty)

zipcode.title:
the address zipcode
Validations: 
- must be exactly 5 characters this is to ensure the client inputs the proper zip code

city.title:
the city
Validations:
- must be at least 3 characters long (meaning cannot be empty)

state.title:
the state/municipality
Validations
- must be at least 2 characters long

longitude.title:
longitude
Validations: None - can be empty

lattitude.title:
latittude
Validations: None - can be empty

id.description: Unique identifier for the business account.

email.description: Email associated with the business account.

address.description: Physical address associated with the business account.

bio.description: Short description of the business account. Maximum of 200 characters.

headline.description: Headline for the profile of the business account.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the business account.

tags.description: Tags associated with the business account. Between 1 and 10 tags are allowed.

authnAccountId.description: Identifier for the associated authentication service account.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the business account is active.

username.description: Username for the business account. Must be at least 10 characters long.

isPrivate.description: Indicates whether the business account is private.

isEmailVerified.description: Indicates whether the email associated with the business account has been verified.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the business account was created.

verifiedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the email for the business account was verified.

companyEstablishedDate.description: Date when the company associated with the business account was established.

companyIndustryType.description: Industry type of the company associated with the business account.

companyWebsiteUrl.description: Website URL of the company associated with the business account.

companyDescription.description: Description of the company associated with the business account.

companyName.description: Name of the company associated with the business account.

businessAccountSettings.description: Settings specific to the business account.

accountType.description: The type of profile associated with the business account (e.g., individual, corporate).

BusinessAccount.description: BusinessAccount represents a business account within the context of solomon-ai.

account.title:
User account to create 
Validations:
- cannot be nil hence required

communityIdsToFollow.title:
set of community IDs to follow 
Validations:
- at least 0 and at most 20 community ids supported at one time

profileImage.title:
The profile image of the user
Validations:
- must be a valid URI

password.title:
The password  of the user
Validations:
- must be a at least 10 characters long

bankAccountLinking.title: wether to enable linking bank account for account

thirdPartyApps.title: list of supported third party apps of interest

alerts.title: True if user wants to be alerted for anomalies

NotificationSettings.Type.description:
- TYPE_EMAIL: email based notification
 - TYPE_SMS: sms based notification
 - TYPE_IN_APP: app based notification
NotificationSettings.Type.title: type of enabled notification

ProfileType.title: ProfileType: represents the type of account tied to a given profile

tagName.title:
name of tag
validations: 
- cannot be empty
- must be at least 3 characters long

tagDescription.title:
description of tag
validations: 
- cannot be empty
- must be at least 10 characters long

metadata.title:
metadata associated with tag
validations:
- must provide between 1 and 10 metadata tags

Tags.title: Tags: represents metadata tags associated to an account

account.title:
UserAccount to update
Validation:
- cannot nil hence required

UpdateUserRequest.title:
UpdateUserRequest: Represents the request object invoked against the user
service to update a given user account

UpdateUserResponse.title:
UpdateUserResponse: Represents the response object returned as a response to
the `update-user` request

email.description: Email associated with the user account.

address.description: Physical address associated with the user.

bio.description: Brief description about the user, up to 200 characters.

headline.description: Short headline for the user's profile.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the account.

tags.description: Tags associated with the user account, between 1 and 10.

authnAccountId.description: ID for the authentication service linked to this account.

isActive.description: Indicates if the account is currently active.

username.description: Username associated with the account, minimum of 10 characters.

isPrivate.description: Indicates if the account is set to private.

isEmailVerified.description: Indicates if the user's email has been verified.

createdAt.description: Timestamp for when the account was created.

verifiedAt.description: Timestamp for when the email was verified.

userSettings.description: Settings specific to the user account.

accountType.description: Enum indicating the type of profile (e.g., individual, corporate).

UserAccount.description: @brief Represents a user account in the context of simfinni.

publicProfile.description:
Privacy settings.

Whether the user's profile is public.

enableGoalJournal.description: Option to share transaction history with friends/family.

dashboardWidgets.description: Dashboard customization, e.g., specific widgets or reports.

UserSettings.description: User settings for the fintech application.
